trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Lockport
There were no other sightings in Lockport on or around August 16th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI have had dreams where they seem to be to real for at least 4 yrs or more, on tuesday aug 16th of 2011 i had one , i woke up about 5 30 am lying on my right side next to my wife , i rolled over on my back and straight above me was a square black hole ripped right threw my ceiling , the edge's were rolled over on to my ceiling , inside was just so dark but bright black , the darkest black i have ever seen ! , inside was a pair of bright orange eyes stair'ing down at me , they looked like they were about 2ft inside the black from where the ceiling should have been , i could not move as i was looking back at the eyes , at first i thought it was a devil or deamon come to take me , but just then it showed the outline of its shoulder an head area and i new it was something else , after about a minute the eyes seem to disappered up into the black an the tunnel thing shrank away and my ceiling returned back to normal , i wanted to be scared but something kept me calm , for 3 days i was so calm like it druged me or something , latter on that day my wife an my self went into the local supermarket in town an as soon as i walked in i felt like i was going to start floating up in air , i think they or what was using my dreams to test me ,for what i dont know , i have not had lifelike dreams sence that morning ! i know what i saw but i know what saw me , i would like to know if anyone else has had this happen to them ? signed why me ? ps i would like to talk to someone about this but who ?
Summary: been having life like dreams ,woke up from one ,rolled over on my back , something was watching me threw my sealing
